statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); user=$(whoami); time=$(date +%H:%M:%S); if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); printf "\033[2m%s \033[0;36m%s \033[0;33m%s \033[0;32m%s \033[0;35m%s\033[0m" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$branch" "$model" "$user" "$time"; else printf "\033[2m%s \033[0;33m%s \033[0;32m%s \033[0;35m%s\033[0m" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$model" "$user" "$time"; fi

hooks.command: make archive_current && make create_struct && echo 'ðŸ“ Directory structure created'
echo "$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') - Pipeline session started" >> results/logs/session.log
if [ -f config/sources.md ] && [ -f config/targets.md ]; then echo 'âœ… Configuration files validated'; else echo 'âš ï¸ Missing config files - check config/sources.md and config/targets.md'; fi
PREV_SESSIONS=$(find results/archive -maxdepth 1 -type d | wc -l); echo "ðŸ“Š Previous sessions: $((PREV_SESSIONS-1))"
echo 'ðŸš€ AI Startup Market Research Pipeline Ready'
AGENT_TYPE=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.subagent_type' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); echo "âš¡ Starting $AGENT_TYPE agent: $(date '+%H:%M:%S')"
DISK_USAGE=$(df . | tail -1 | awk '{print $5}' | sed 's/%//'); if [ "$DISK_USAGE" -gt 90 ]; then echo "âš ï¸ Warning: Disk usage at $DISK_USAGE%"; fi

FILE_PATH=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.file_path' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); if echo "$FILE_PATH" | grep -q '\.\./'; then echo 'ðŸš¨ Security: Path traversal detected in $FILE_PATH' && exit 2; fi

FILE_PATH=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.file_path' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); if [ -f "$FILE_PATH" ] && [ "$FILE_PATH" != "unknown" ]; then BACKUP_DIR="results/archive/$(date +%Y-%m-%d)"; mkdir -p "$BACKUP_DIR" && cp "$FILE_PATH" "$BACKUP_DIR/$(basename "$FILE_PATH").$(date +%H%M%S).bak" && echo 'ðŸ’¾ Backup created for $(basename "$FILE_PATH")'; fi
CONTENT_SIZE=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.content' 2>/dev/null | wc -c); if [ "$CONTENT_SIZE" -gt 100000 ]; then echo "âš ï¸ Large file warning: $(($CONTENT_SIZE/1000))KB content"; fi

URL=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.url' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); if echo "$URL" | grep -qE '^https?://(docs\.anthropic\.com|github\.com)'; then echo 'âœ… Validated external request to trusted domain'; else echo 'âš ï¸ External web request to: $URL'; fi

FILE_PATH=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.file_path' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); if [ "$FILE_PATH" != "unknown" ]; then WORD_COUNT=$(wc -w < "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || echo 0); echo "ðŸ“„ $(basename "$FILE_PATH") generated ($WORD_COUNT words)"; echo "$(date '+%H:%M:%S')|$(basename "$FILE_PATH")|$WORD_COUNT|$(stat -c%s "$FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || echo 0)" >> results/logs/file_metrics.csv; fi

RESEARCH_COUNT=$(find results/research -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | wc -l); GTM_COUNT=$(find results/gtm -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | wc -l); TOTAL_WORDS=$(find results -name '*.md' -exec wc -w {} \; 2>/dev/null | awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum+0}'); echo "ðŸ“Š Progress: Research($RESEARCH_COUNT/5) GTM($GTM_COUNT/5) Total:$TOTAL_WORDS words"
if [ $(($(find results/research -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | wc -l))) -eq 5 ] && [ ! -f results/.research_complete ]; then echo "ðŸŽ‰ Research phase completed!" && touch results/.research_complete; fi
if [ $(($(find results/gtm -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | wc -l))) -eq 5 ] && [ ! -f results/.gtm_complete ]; then echo "ðŸŽ‰ GTM phase completed!" && touch results/.gtm_complete; fi
AGENT_TYPE=$(echo '$TOOL_INPUT' | jq -r '.subagent_type' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); echo "$(date '+%H:%M:%S') - $AGENT_TYPE agent completed" >> results/logs/agent_timeline.log
echo "ðŸ¤– Sub-agent execution completed at $(date '+%H:%M:%S')"
TOTAL_FILES=$(find results -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | wc -l); echo "âœ… Sub-agent completed. Total reports: $TOTAL_FILES"
ls -la results/ 2>/dev/null | grep -E '(research|gtm)' | awk '{print "ðŸ“ " $9 ": " $5 " bytes"}' || echo 'ðŸ“ Check results/ for generated reports'

END_TIME=$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'); START_TIME=$(head -1 results/logs/session.log 2>/dev/null | cut -d' ' -f1-2 || echo 'unknown'); echo "â±ï¸ Session: $START_TIME to $END_TIME" >> results/logs/session.log

FINAL_COUNT=$(find results -name '*.md' 2>/dev/null | wc -l); TOTAL_WORDS=$(find results -name '*.md' -exec wc -w {} \; 2>/dev/null | awk '{sum+=$1} END {print sum+0}'); echo "ðŸŽ¯ Pipeline complete! Generated $FINAL_COUNT documents ($TOTAL_WORDS words)"
TOTAL_SIZE=$(du -sh results/ 2>/dev/null | cut -f1); echo "ðŸ“ Total output: $TOTAL_SIZE in results/"

if [ -f results/.research_complete ] && [ -f results/.gtm_complete ]; then echo "âœ… Full pipeline success: Research + GTM phases completed"; else echo "âš ï¸ Partial completion - check missing phases"; fi
echo "ðŸ“Š Session summary logged in results/logs/" && if command -v tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then tree results/ -I 'archive' | head -20; else find results/ -name '*.md' | head -10; fi
if echo '$USER_PROMPT' | grep -qi 'pipeline\|research\|gtm'; then echo "ðŸŽ¯ Detected pipeline execution request - monitoring enabled"; fi
